description: Pacific Island adolescent girls participating in the two-day preparatory workshop ahead of the Pacific Girl Regional Stakeholdersâ€™ Dialogue in May 2018 wrote a song together to express their feelings and experiences. It highlights challenges for Pacific girls, including teen pregnancy and cyberbullying, and encourages girls to believe in themselves to overcome any barriers.
keywords: Health, audio-visual, enhancing-agency, pacific-girls, pacific-women, social-media-and-polular-culture, social-norms
name: Pacific Girl Song
